resources.string:
In order to enhance and improve the driving experience in BMW cars in general (and BMW’s Autonomous cars in particular), drivers and car testers must understand and feel not only the condition of the environment and the traffic conditions, but also the condition of the road, e.g. fraction of the road, humidity, temperature and angle. 

Our system aims to receive the conditions of the road and data collected by the car’s sensors, and provide a comfortable and elegant Android application, to graphically display the Real-time data, collected by the sensors, on a screen display attached to the car’s dashboard. 

Developed by
 Daher Daher [daher928@campus.technion.ac.il]
 Vivian Lawin [vivlawin@campus.technion.ac.il]
 
Supervisor
 Boaz Mizrahi
 
Technion - Institute of Technology
 Department of Electrical Engineering | High Speed Digital Systems Lab (HSDSL)
